articles.title: UK's 'Herculean' vaccine target can be achieved, minister says - Reuters UK
articles.description: British Prime Minister Boris Johnson's "Herculean" aim to vaccinate around 14 million of the most vulnerable people against COVID-19 by the middle of next month is achievable, his vaccine minister said on Wednesday.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
LONDON (Reuters) - British Prime Minister Boris Johnsons Herculean aim to vaccinate around 14 million of the most vulnerable people against COVID-19 by the middle of next month is a… [+616 chars]
